name: Chang-Hoon Nam
description: Nam has been an associate ofWakako Okadafor years, as he was hand picked by her to do business. Ever since, he hasn't let her down once. Sometime in2077, he started digging into finding otherNetrunnersthat were roaming TheNet, in particular one by the name ofSpectral Kid, whom he believes is a reckless teenage 'runner who needs guidance before he gets himself into too much trouble. Spectral Kid was not to be reasoned with, however, and eventually got himself killed whilst poking around inVoodoo Boysterritory. At one point Nam was contacted by a netrunner in distress named Dante, who had...
